title: Palms Up Together
description:
Two hands held out together with open palms facing up, in a slightly cupped manner, as if expecting an object to be placed within them.

May also be used to represent an open book in American Sign Language (ASL), or the gesture used by followers of Islam when praying.
apple_vendor_description: The palms-up-together emoji on Apple devices is a vibrant and inviting symbol, rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy sheen and soft, rounded contours. Each hand is depicted with subtle highlights and shadows, giving them a tactile, three-dimensional quality. This emoji, as seen on Apple products, is commonly used to express openness, gratitude, asking for something, or a hopeful plea, adding a warm and earnest tone to messages.
